title.narrative: To Partner with Research Organization, International Institute for Tropical Agriculture (IITA) for Climate Resilient Seedlings

description.narrative: This activity seeks to introduce farmers (Community Youths, Women and Men) to platforms that can provide agric-aids thereby cushioning financial challenges and agribusiness related an activity which includes training on the appropriate use of herbicides, training of soil physicochemical analysis which will help determine appropriate fertilizers suited for a particular soil that will help curb the impact of climate change. (At the moment this activity has only undertaken advocacy visit to International Institute for Tropical Agriculture (IITA).
